title: U.S. Says Russia Is Planning to Fabricate a Pretext to Invade Ukraine
sub_head: Officials say newly declassified intelligence shows Moscow seeks to use staged video as justification for attack
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”The White House declassified intelligence Thursday that officials said show that Russia is planning to fabricate a pretext for an invasion of Ukraine, expanding on intelligence the administration released earlier that shows the kinds of ploys Moscow could use to justify an incursion.
U.S. officials said they released the intelligence to expose Russian tactics in an attempt to avert a conflict inside Ukraine, the latest in a series of similar moves in recent weeks.
